attributes.additional_details: Flintshire County Council are not currently providing transport to single parents to and from college, this petition is to highlight the disparity that this causes within our further education establishment, it is about actively campaigning for free public transports not just for single parents but for all students that meet the distance criterion set out by the college. This petition will go forward to Flintshire County Council to ask them to address this, and to extend their transport policies to include children and parents thereof.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Welsh Government.
